trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Pembroke Pines
There were no other sightings in Pembroke Pines on or around May 28th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking out of school waiting for my dad to pick me up from the school baseball field. I first noticed it when I got some shade when there wasn't a cloud in the sky. I just though the object was a speck. It was just hovering for a few minutes then just shot off like a speeding bullet multiplied by 50. I was just staring at it puzzled what it was for about 2 minutes, until I knew what it was so I took out my camera phone and got a few pictures with 12 times optical zoom, and when it was gone I thought I was just day dreaming. It flew away at incredible speeds.
